price: «ባንተና ከአንተም ጋር ባሉት ሰዎች ምክንያት ገደቢሶች ኾን» አሉት፡፡ «ገደቢስነታችሁ አላህ ዘንድ ነው፤ ይልቁንም እናንተ የምትፈተኑ ሕዝቦች ናችሁ» አላቸው፡፡
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱطَّيَّرۡنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَۚ قَالَ طَٰٓئِرُكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū iṭṭayyarnā bika wabiman maʿaka qāla ṭāirukum ʿinda al-lahi bal antum qawmun tuf'tanūna
translations: We consider you a bad omen
We consider you a bad omen
